title: RiME [v 1.03] (2017)
description:
Language: English, Russian
Release date: May, 26 2017

System Requirements:
Operating system: Windows 7 / Windows 8.1 / Windows 10 (64-bit versions)
Processor: Intel Core i5 2310 2.9 GHz / AMD FX-6300
Memory: 4 GB RAM
Video card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550Ti (1GB) / AMD Radeon 6950 (1GB)
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX® 11
Free space on hard disk: 8 GB

Release info:
Based on the release of CODEX
Do not cut / Do not recoded
Game version: 1.03
Installation time 10 minutes on the HDD (Depends on the computer)

Features:
Explore: explore the mysterious island for fun. Interact with the wild, look for hidden objects or simply enjoy the scenery and sounds.
Solve puzzles: make your way through the ancient ruins, discover the miracles hidden in them, solve puzzles based on sound, light, shadows, perspective, platforms and even time management.
Disclose secrets: learn the smallest details about the boy's past, open up a sea of ​​secrets and collect a collection of unique objects.
Be seduced: immerse yourself in the magical world of Mediterranean wonders, wrapped in enchanting music and bright colors.

Installation:
Mount and install
Play
